text: hey <@U184J2R7S> thanks for these detailed notes. As a high-level application developer, the things I found particularly interesting: that COP is built on CloudFlare’s SSL library, which is why the interface is changing from GRPC to REST. Details here on Jira: <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-763>, and here’s the CFSSL codebase and docs: <https://github.com/cloudflare/cfssl>. FIPS certification would be great for us at Everledger. Feels like things are going really well, nice one everyone :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.title: cloudflare/cfssl
